properties.areaDesc: Tampa Bay waters; Waters from Englewood to Tarpon Springs FL out 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Englewood to Tarpon Springs FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Special Marine Warning issued January 4 at 9:46AM EST until January 4 at 10:30AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a

* Special Marine Warning for...
Coastal waters from Englewood to Tarpon Springs FL out 20 NM...
Tampa Bay waters...
Waters from Englewood to Tarpon Springs FL out 20 to 60 NM...

* Until 1030 AM EST.

* At 946 AM EST, strong thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from 6 nm east of Tarpon Springs to 29 nm southwest of
Egmont Key, moving east at 35 knots.

HAZARD...Wind gusts 34 knots or greater.

SOURCE...Radar.

IMPACT...Expect wind gusts in excess of 34 knots, suddenly higher
waves, frequent lightning, and heavy downpours. Make sure
all on board are wearing life jackets.

* Locations impacted include...
Clearwater Beach, Old Tampa Bay, Howard Frankland Bridge, Madeira
Beach Reef, Cockroach Bay, Anna Maria Island, Treasure Island Reef,
Pass-A-Grille Channel, Southwest Channel, Saint Pete Beach Reef,
Port Manatee Reef, Tampa Bay, Hillsborough Bay, Johns Pass, Manatee
3 Mile North Reef, Manatee 7 Mile South Reef, Gandy Bridge, Egmont
Key, Indian Rocks Beach and Sunshine Skyway Bridge.
properties.instruction: Move to safe harbor until hazardous weather passes.
